timeline.bodyText:
So I think by default autoprefixer uses the browser list from package.json (or other files), and then if not defined, does its own list of browsers.
I think we need to make sure we have a browserlist (https://www.npmjs.com/package/browserslist) defined that matches the browser compatibility matrix that matrix jenkins - https://www.jenkins.io/doc/administration/requirements/web-browsers/ (since its a relative list, its pretty easy to define in browserlist)
timeline.author: halkeye
